name: Empire
title: 50 Billion Baby
text:
Synopsis
The Real World Assets (RWA) tokenization market is poised for significant growth, with industry experts projecting expansion to $50 billion within 12-18 months, driven by increased DeFi integration and mainstream adoption.

Key Insights
- Current RWA onchain value is approximately $15.2 billion, with tokenized treasuries around $4 billion
- VanEck and Bitwise predict RWA market could grow to $50 billion
- Carlos Domingo (Securitize CEO) expects Treasury tokenization to reach $10-$20 billion next year
- Key growth drivers include peer-to-peer transferability and DeFi integration
- Domingo believes DeFi integration could expand the RWA market 10x
- Talent acquisition and reducing organizational bottlenecks are current industry challenges
- Regulatory environment is becoming more favorable for tokenization efforts
